document.docAuthor: He, Zhiqiang, Zhang, Yalin, Mckamey, Stuart H. & Zahniser, James N.
document.masterDocTitle: The Chinese Hecalina (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae: Hecalini) with descriptions of a new genus and seven new species

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 52–68.
Linnavuoriella arcuata
.
52, male adult, dorsal view; 53, female adult, dorsal view; 54, female anterior tentorium; 55, female left fore femur; 56, female left forewing; 57, female right hindwing; 58, female 7th abdominal sternum; 59, 1 st valvulae; 60, apical part of 1 st valvulae; 61, 2 nd valvulae; 62, apical part of 2 nd valvulae; 63–64, aedeagus, lateral and ventral view respectively; 65, style, dorsal view; 66, connective, dorsal view; 67, male pygofer, lateral view; 68, subgenital plate.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks. This species was reported by Cai & Wang (2004) to feed on mulberry ( Moraceae :
Morus
sp.).
